option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Shadow Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#0D000000"/> <!-- 5% black shadow (0D in hex = 5% opacity) --> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> <!-- Main Background Layer, shifted slightly to create shadow effect --> <item android:top="2dp" android:bottom="2dp"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/icon_backround"/> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> </layer-list>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="center" android:text="Refund" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/transactionLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="50dp" android:text="Select Transaction:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/title" />
<Spinner android:id="@+id/transactionSpinner" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionLabel" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/continueButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="32dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="true" android:enabled="false" android:focusable="true" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionSpinner" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/orText" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" android:text="Or" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/continueButton" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/transactionNumberLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:text="Enter Transaction Number:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/orText" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/transactionNumber" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:hint="ex. 000123" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionNumberLabel" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/secondContinueButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="32dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="true" android:enabled="false" android:focusable="true" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionNumber" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="center" android:text="Refund" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/transactionLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="50dp" android:text="Select Transaction:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/title" />
<Spinner android:id="@+id/transactionSpinner" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionLabel" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/continueButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="32dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="true" android:enabled="false" android:focusable="true" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionSpinner" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/orText" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" android:text="Or" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/continueButton" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/transactionNumberLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:text="Enter Transaction Number:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/orText" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/transactionNumber" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:inputType="number" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionNumberLabel" />
<Button android:id="@+id/secondContinueButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="32dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue with Number" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionNumber" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="center" android:text="Void" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/transactionLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="120dp" android:text="Select Transaction:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/title" /> <Spinner android:id="@+id/transactionSpinner" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:textColorHint="@color/icon_text" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="top|start" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="normal" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionLabel" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/checkoutButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="true" android:enabled="false" android:focusable="true" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@id/transactionSpinner" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionSpinner" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="center" android:text="Void" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/transactionLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="120dp" android:text="Select Transaction:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/title" /> <Spinner android:id="@+id/transactionSpinner" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionLabel" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/checkoutButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="true" android:enabled="false" android:focusable="true" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@id/transactionSpinner" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/transactionSpinner" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <TextView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="12dp" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:background="@color/white" />

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <TextView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="12dp" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" />
